final_mermaid_code:
graph TD
    A[Purchase order received] --> B[Check stock availability]
    B -->|product in stock| C[Retrieve product from warehouse]
    B -->|product not in stock| D{XORGateway}
    D --> E[Check raw materials availability]
    E -->|raw materials provided by Supplier 1| F[Request raw materials from Supplier 1]
    E -->|raw materials provided by Supplier 2| G[Request raw materials from Supplier 2]
    F --> H[Obtain raw materials from Supplier 1]
    G --> I[Obtain raw materials from Supplier 2]
    H --> J{ParallelGateway}
    I --> J
    J --> K[Manufacture product]
    K --> L{XORGateway}
    C --> L
    L --> M[Confirm order]
    M --> N{ParallelGateway}
    N --> O[Get shipment address]
    N --> P[Emit invoice]
    O --> Q[Ship product]
    P --> R[Receive payment]
    Q --> S{ParallelGateway}
    R --> S
    S --> T[Archive order]
    T --> U[Order fulfilled]
